response: "{ \"title\": \"Hard: Number Transformer\", \"description\": \"Write a function `transform_number` that takes an integer as input and returns the sum of the multiples of 3 or 5 below it. If the number is negative, return -1.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef transform_number(n: int) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `n` (int): A positive integer.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all multiples of 3 or 5 below `n`. If `n` is negative, return -1.\\n\", \"code\": \"def transform_number(n: int) -> int:\\n    if n < 0:\\n        return -1\\n    else:\\n        return sum(i for i in range(n) if i % 3 == 0 or i % 5 == 0)\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert transform_number(10) == 23\", \"assert transform_number(16) == 45\", \"assert transform_number(-1) == -1\"] }"
